text: Are You Sure? (French: En êtes-vous bien sûr?) is a 1947 French Belgian comedy movie directed by Jacques Houssin and starring Robert Dhéry, Martine Carol, Grégoire Aslan, Marcel Josz, Armand Crabbé, Colette Brosset. It was distributed by Les Films Corona. ==Other websites== * Category:1947 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jacques Houssin
title: Are You Sure? (movie)
